reviewText: Love Christmas movies and these are really good ones.
I was so excited to see all my favorites on on dvd collection.  I have been looking for most of them for two years now and to get 4 with one purchase was wonderful.  I love them all.
I love Christmas movies.  I watch them all year long.  It's nice to add some new ones to my growing collection.
love it!

I first saw this adorable  tv movie last year - I loved it instantly . The actors are all very likeable and the fantasy aspect is charming .
The interesting thing here is the theme of not judging people too quickly -everyone  is a combination of good and bad - no one is perfect. And seeing Meredith Baxter and Michael Gross (of  Family Ties) together again as the parents was a wonderful surprise!
Good
Getting four Christmas movies at once always leaves me happy.  Especially enjoyed "Naughty or Nice" and "It's Christmas, Carol."
fun
luv holday movies
Good movie!
I especially like The Naughty and Nice movie.  It really lifts you up at Christmas or any time of year.
Fun Christmas movies.
I love Hallmark movies and three of them in this pack are very entertaining!  My fave was Naughty or nice, great holiday viewing. : )
great dvd
Great movies for the whole family to watch.
Brand New in Packaging!  Thanks!
Perfect!!
Only wanted Naughty of Nice but had to buy a 4 pack to get it. Didn't need the other 3 as I already had them.
not the right movies
Arrived quickly, brand new.  Love this.
Received my movies today can't wait to watch them with my kids.  Oh and thanks for the speedy shipping
I watch Christmas movies all year long. This is a nice set of family movies.

Bought this for 'Naughty or Nice' movie. Good modern day lesson: things are not always as they seem, good and bad to everything. Well acted, good characters. Heartwarming and entertaining. Loved Hilarie Burton in this. Owned her mistakes and tried to rectify damage done. So much better than the usual drivel put out at Christmas time!
Part of these movies was very good and the quality was good.
nothing to say except itworked great
Very nice movie
MY WIFE IS VERY HAPPY
Great holiday movies!
thought I would never find the movie nughty or nice . adoreable movie and I love cast , which is another reason I bought this movie.

Having seen all of the movies on the Hallmark channel in the past, we knew exactly what we were buying.  It was great watching some new favorites.  Hallmark always delivers a really good show, or as in this case, four really good shows.
started a bit weird but once stories got going was worth the watch
I'm adding to my collection and 4 movies in 1 makes it easier. Received on time and satisfied.
Love all these movies!! I have a very big collection of Holiday movies so for them to be in a 4-pk is great.
Great holiday pack.....enjoy watching these when I want to.
Love these movies and at. A great price

I waited a few years before the movie The town Christmas forgot became available and I am happy to have it in my Christmas library.  The movie Naughty or nice is a good addition to my Christmas video library also.  I believe that anytime you can add 4 movies in one purchase it will have a positive influence on your holiday viewing enjoyment.  I hope you like them as much as we do.
very nice dvd

I bought this DVD for the Naughty or Nice movie. I love that one! I haven't yet had time to watch the other 3 but they look interesting. It arrived in a reasonable amount of time and was packaged very well. Thank you!

Love Hallmark's Christmas movies, and was thrilled to find 4 packs. They were never in stock at Walmart, and was tired of always checking. I didn't mind paying shipping for them since it was still a bargain if your a fan of Hallmark Christmas.
GOOD CHRISTMAS MOVIES.
Hallmarks Holiday movies are always enjoyable and can be viewed  by the whole family.  The movie bundle is great for winter watching.
like xmas movies
thank you
I love these movies. Well well written, directed, and acted! Must see for any Christmas Movie Lover!
Great Movies, Great Deal!!!

I mainly bought this DVD collection for the movie Naughty or Nice which is one of my favorites. It's such a darling movie. The other movies are also pretty good so it was definitely worth it for me. Should you purchase this collection, I hope you enjoy!
Couldn't find "Naughty or Nice" anywhere else so I bought these (some of my favorites for the holidays).
Love all of these movies.  The price was great and I love these family movies.  Great acting & the comedy is so much fun.
Wonderful,i am so very pleased,thank you,God Bless,,,

4 great movies for the price of 1! What more can you ask for?
Excellent
There was no menu or prompt helps on the CD, therefore, I don't know how you can play movie two and 4.  Made in Mexico!  Poor!  This is my second review I have written with no response from you.
We love these movies!!

I purchased this 4 pack mainly for the Naughty or Nice movie. I like the movie and how cool is it to see Michael Gross and Meredith Baxter-Birney together again! Hallmark can keep "The Town That Christmas Forgot" and any other movie they've had Lauren Holly in. Her acting gets worse with every movie she makes. The Wishing Tree is OK. Haven't watched the "It's Christmas, Carol" movie yet, so I can't comment on that one. The movies play nicely thru my Blu-Ray player, but I've noticed that in the Hallmark multi movie packs, they aren't as clear and have some fine horizontal lines appear around images.  This isn't present in any of the single Hallmark movies I've purchased...those ones play crystal clear.
Nice price for a 4-movie set. Made in Mexico, previewed, seems OK. Fast shipping.

This was the only way we could find the Naughty or Nice Christmas movie.  But that's ok, we really wanted the Wishing Tree too.  These 2 movies were well done and great family movies.  The other 2 were pretty good, we would watch them again.  Hightly recommend this pack for the family.
Thank you!
great movies wort the money
Great collection of Christmas movies. Delivered ahead of time. No damage and played perfectly. Thanks.
They are all good movies but the two at the top are my favorite.
Good movies
Four touching Hallmark Christmas films. Family friendly films that are totally watching again.
Love these four Hallmark movies, would recommend, A+ seller, thanks
excellent
Great holiday package. Order arrived quickly.
Love Christmas get this movie set.
Great!!  Im a Hallmark Movie fan.

got this for the Naughty or nice movie.. I did not realize these movies are made in Mexico so I was a little worried it would not play right. It works perfectly. Love these movies. Shipping was very fast and well packaged. will buy again if I find a movie I want
Great deal - some great memories - touching and fun!
